home.whySamaDescription: Sama is the first travel website that offers many activit2ies and things to do that vary in destination and price to please all demands. In Sama, we carefully select the most interesting activities & tour packages offered by top travel agencies and put them in one place, arranged in a user-friendly list.

download.caption: Your trip is organized and planned completely
download.caption1: Get full travel packages that we follow with you from boarding the plane until safely returning
download.caption4.1: Price differences when paying and booking fully booked hotels are mistakes..
download.caption4.2: You always end up comparing hotel and ticket prices and have to make sure 100 times that the hotel reservation is the same as your request, and the late response annoys you, your time is counted
download.caption5.3: Per person or per international trip
download.option1Caption: Tickets for today are ready six months in advance
download.option2Caption: Packages include hotels, flights, and all activities
download.descriptionHeader: Sama application gathers all travel and tourism offices in one place for you
download.description1: We protect you from deception from unknown entities, now all added offices are registered and authenticated
download.description2Title: Canceling and amending the trip smoothly
download.description2: Meeting amendments before travel time with a team available 24 hours a day
download.description3: A dedicated number for inquiries for every question about destinations and trip details
download.description4Title: Additional services to complement the trip
download.description4: Booking cars, international driver's license services, and visa services are available
download.question: Think about these questions
download.question1: If I have a problem, who will help me?
download.answer1: The presence of a hotline and WhatsApp operating 24 hours a day without interruption for emergency cases, and it is attached with your booking file
download.question2: Can I know the conditions of the country I'm going to?
download.answer2: Any inquiry is clarified by the travel advisor before booking via the inquiry number
download.question3: Will the driver be available upon arrival?
download.answer3: If you need a driver or want to book a private car for rent, we clarify it for you through the tracking program
download.payment: What are the available payment methods?
